summary: Implements a plugin that encapsulates the TorchElastic distributed training environment, exposing rank, node, and world‑size information as well as the master address and port, while performing validation and updating the runtime configuration for Lightning Fabric.
business_intent: Simplify the integration of TorchElastic with Lightning Fabric so that users can run fault‑tolerant, elastic distributed training without manually handling environment variables or rank bookkeeping.
